title: Zion Williamson Is Finally Feeling Like Himself Again
description: Injuries have hampered the N.B.A. career of the Pelicansâ€™ Williamson, but a grueling summer of early morning workouts has him back on track.

media:description: New Orleans Pelicans forward Zion Williamson missed all of last season with a foot injury.
